name: BRRT!
description:
The game is still laggy and lacks a few visual features id like to add, bt i can assure you, that you will have a good time. Plays pretty much like an arcade twinstick shooter where you collect crystals while fleeing from the isopod hord/

The visula glitches that can occur on restarting are known and are being worked on. They dont affecrt the gameplay adn if you are sick of this shit close the game and start it again.

Esc to go fullscreen
